Uses of Class
com.safenetinc.jcprov.CK_OBJECT_HANDLE

  • Packages that use CK_OBJECT_HANDLE 
    Package Description
    com.safenetinc.jcprov
    Provides access to the API functions, and general structure/class definitions.
    com.safenetinc.jcprov.params
    Provides parameter structure/class definitions used by some mechanisms.
    com.safenetinc.jcprov.sample
    Provides sample code to demonstrate usage of Jcprov.

      Constructors in com.safenetinc.jcprov.params with parameters of type CK_OBJECT_HANDLE 
      Constructor and Description
      CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert, byte[] passwordAuthSafe, byte[] passwordHMAC)
      Simplified constructor where lengths and encryption algo are determined The following encryption algorithms are used : safeBagKgMech = PBE_SHA1_DES3_EDE_CBC safeContentKgMech = PBE_SHA1_RC2_40_CBC hmacKgMech = PBA_SHA1_WITH_SHA1_HMAC
      CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert, byte[] passwordAuthSafe, byte[] passwordHMAC, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeBagKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeContentKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE hmacKgMech)
      Simplified constructor where lengths are determined
      CK_PKCS12_PBE_EXPORT_PARAMS(CK_OBJECT_HANDLE keyCert, byte[] passwordAuthSafe, long passwordAuthSafeLen, byte[] passwordHMAC, long passwordHMACLen, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeBagKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE safeContentKgMech, CK_MECHANISM_TYPE hmacKgMech)
      Values initialised as specified
      CK_PKCS12_PBE_IMPORT_PARAMS(byte[] passwordAuthSafe, long passwordAuthSafeLen, byte[] passwordHMAC, long passwordHMACLen, CK_ATTRIBUTE[] certAttr, long certAttrCount, CK_OBJECT_HANDLE[] hCert, LongRef hCertCount)
      Values initialised as specified
